title: OT12: Openness To Threadxperience
summary:
Key Ideas:
- The blog is hosting an open thread for people to post or ask about anything.
- The blog will no longer face hosting problems as it is now hosted by Trike Apps.
- The author of the post mentions two comments about overachieving German soldiers that were posted earlier.
- A friend suggested that the author read Nick Land's Phyl-Undhu as it contains an argument about the Great Filter which resembles the author's own.

Key Learnings:
- Trike Apps is a custom website and software design company.
- The author of the post had previously linked to Nick Land's work without having read it.
- Land's Phyl-Undhu contains a character named "Alex Scott" who makes an argument similar to the author's.

Key Questions:
- None presented in this portion of the blog post.
